title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, April 5, 2020
description: It’s the birthday of Hattie Alexander (1901), who developed a treatment for the deadly childhood illness influenzal meningitis, also known as Hib.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of Hattie Alexander (1901), who developed a treatment for the deadly childhood illness influenzal meningitis, also known as Hib.
